Content.Knowledge Point: Understanding what people are looking for
Content.Text: Go into your current feed and see what types of pictures people are engaging with. Check out the types of content that have the most engagement and find a pattern. Go on your competitors' feeds and see which posts have the most engagement.

Content.Knowledge Point: Using Answer the Public for content ideas
Content.Text: Answer the Public is a tool that generates questions and topics related to a keyword. Use it to find content ideas based on what people are searching for.
Plan content around national holidays, events, and big holidays to stay relevant and engage with your audience.

Create videos, pictures, and IG stories to engage with your audience. Videos are important for capturing attention, while pictures and captions tell a story and provide educational content. IG stories are great for showing behind-the-scenes content and connecting with your audience on a more personal level.
